content.detailedDescription: I witnessed the object on the way home from the supermarket at exactly 8:13. i first saw it from the north-west and it was headed toward the south-east. i pulled into my driveway a minute later and got out of my car to get a better look at it. it moved slowly and in a straight line while slowly ascending. it was shaped like a disc and had approximately 8 green lights around the edge of it. it was dark in color and metallic. there were about 10-12 square holes on the underside of the object. i called my boyfriend to tell him to run outside to see it, but by the time he came outside the object was gone. i was able to see the object for a little over a minute before it went over the horizon. the object left no trail and made no noise.
content.summary: Disc shaped object with green lights around edge

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 3am, i had gotten out of bed, my blinds were open in my living room and thru my curtain i saw a large light, thinking it might have been a helicopter (because it did not move), i went to the window to look.  there was no sound, and as i watched, it looked like it blinked out, and i heard what sounded like a sonic boom.  thinking it was and explosion i watched to see if there was debris falling, there was nothing. i  thought it might be lighting but there was no storm
content.summary: Round light

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south along sevenoaks way towards orpington when i saw what i thought was a plane. it may have been moving slowly but i don't remember. i was trying to see if it had wings or other details but had to look back at the road for a moment. i only looked away for a second or less and looked back and the object had gone. it was definitely in the sky and not a reflection. i was driving in a straight line so i knew where to look. it was metalic and reflected sunlight. i kept looking for it but did not see that object again.
about 2 minutes later i saw a round light in the sky. for about 5 or 10 seconds it had consistent brightness and was moving slowly right and slightly up but not quite in a straight line then it started fading and was gone in about 5 seconds. the sky was pretty clear. there were some faint high clouds but even if the object was that high the clouds were too thin for the object to vanish behind.
i would have expected to feel exited or a bit scared about seeing things like this but was completely calm which for me is very unusual.
content.summary: I saw two different objects about two minutes apart which both vanished.

content.detailedDescription: the object was traveling swiftly from the south southwest to the north northeast relatively slow. at about 85 degrees it suddenly emitted light that was brighter than its original amount. it flared up for about 2 or 3 seconds and long enough to think something odd was occurring. it wasn't like a meteor because there wasn't any contour trail and once the light pulse faded back to its normal brightness it kept moving north toward the pole. i have seen satillites and this one didn't fade to black once it past into the shadow of the earth.
content.summary: The object was traveling from the south to the northeast emitting an orange light when it suddenly flared up for 2 to 3 seconds then returned to its original colored light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home letting the cat outside,i was pointing west. i saw two cessna type planes flying extremely close to each other coming from the south heading north. so, i stood at the back door,turned the lights off and took a closer look,because i have never seen these types of planes fly this close together and at night. i noticed flying just in front of the two planes was a white glowing orb. just as all 3 craft were directly in front of me i saw two smaller white glowing orbs emit from the main bigger white orb,one went above and one went below. the bigger orb in front moved slightly forward forming a triangular shape. the crafts were all flying in the same direction at a slightly slower than normal speed. i am not sure if the planes were following or escorting the objects. i watched the event until i couldn't see them anymore.

this was very shocking to me and it was hard for my brain to tell myself this is what you are seeing. i did not fall asleep until 4:30am because this was heavy on my mind. i was a dod spouse and i have seen fighter jets fly pardner a lot of times,these two planes i saw last night were not fighter jets, because they were not loud enough. when this event took place the sky was clear and the stars were out,this was not a star or planet moving in unison. later,i kept going to the door and looking out but nothing more and a couple of hours after the event the sky was mostly cloudy.
content.summary: White orb between two cessna-like planes that emitted two more smaller white orbs which flew in a triangular formation.

content.detailedDescription:
There were 4 of us out on atv's, west of mina, nevada at the dry lake bed that used to be used by the military.  we were en route to an area with petroglyphs. my husband and i were in front and our friends were in back. i started feeling very lightheaded, like i was going to become nauseated.  my heart started racing and i felt like i was going to lose consciousness and started falling over the atv.  i sensed the word "predator" and could not help but feel we were going to be attacked.  it was all i could do to get out the word "cougar".  then we all heard it.  a horrible noise like something with very bad brakes, a sound of metal scraping granite.  our friends later reported that they felt as if a large truck was coming up on them and one of them felt like he was going to have cardiac arrest from the fear he felt.  it had come up from behind but it was not a truck, but a triangle military craft.  not a large triangle but much like the paper planes we used to make in school with the triangular surface.  it moved very slowly right over our heads and seemed to hover above me.  i could see the red light underneath that pulsed and i was hoping it was not too terribly radioactive.  it was tan, sage green blobs of paint with rusty red outlining some of the blobs.  i was amazed that there was no heat and i assumed that the heat was going out through the top of it.  i could see wavery heat around it, but did not feel heat radiating off of it.  then, with a quick turn it turned back towards tonopah.  i was wondering if what was making me sick was the equipment it had to sense it's targets up ahead...Elf perhaps.
our friends and i recovered okay.  our one friend was very shakened.
content.summary: Triangular, had desert camouflage pattern of tan, sage green and a rust red, came from the direction of tonopah, mad

content.detailedDescription: There were three of us, that observed glowing orbs, glowing space crafts, and a metallic saucer. we were all at work when we noticed a metallic flying saucer above our heads. we all ran to get our cameras. we observed orbs on both sides of the sun. we observed glowing flying saucers taken off from the surface of the sun. one of us taking pictures had our finger with a glove on over the lens. the radiation from the orb went through a glove and his finger and onto the picture. we all experienced sunburn the next day. the objects were moving as fast as light. there was an electricity in the air. all three of us are very credible and we have awesome pictures. after we observe the space craft for at least 45 minutes. they took off as fast as they appear. approximately 10 minutes later we observed at least 10 to 15 fighter jets go over head straight for where we observed the spacecraft. i'm only sending you a couple of pictures. we have plenty. this is not a hoax! this is not a joke.
content.summary: There were three of us, that witnessed orbs on both sides of the sun, then moved at the speed of light. we also observed in metallic saucer shaped spacecraft directly above our heads. we also seen glowing spacecrafts coming out of the sun.

content.detailedDescription: The above orb, ball object entered my bedroom window frame from south to north (i have a 1,000 ft panoramic view of downtown cincinnati about 3 dues west miles out of downtown skyline, object flew at horizontal at around 1,500 ft - looked to be traveling at 100 miles per hour and decelerated to a dead hoover, north east view for me - over the valley in between downtown and my high rise residence - appeared to be about one mile away - had to be as big as a school bus.  it was absolutely brilliant orange glow and rotating - after hoovering for maybe 5-10 seconds, it began to travel northeast, moving away from me and dimming until it disappeared completely.  i am a lay person science nut, read theoretical physics, l. suskind, lawrence krause, etc, cosmology junkie, an atheist and a skeptic. only the 1997 phoenix lights intrigued me - but this was like nothing i've seen - it wasn't a meteor or firework, certainly not a drone or aircraft - i've seen plenty.  this had no trail and trajectory was 90 degrees to surface - no descent or ascent - but velocity, 100 mph to 0 - then changed direction - at hoover, i ran to get to get my smart phone - had the flash on which reflected in the glass window - and by the time i adjusted everything it had already dimmed - i chose to run to the window first so i wouldn't miss or lose any personal observation - all i can say is wow!
content.summary: Brilliant, almost florescent orange - appeared to be rotating with cone like protrusions entire circumference

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back to bed after being in the bathroom.  adjusting myself in bed as i sit up when i sleep.  looked out my window and saw a bright white light steadily drift downwards from the sky.  there were no stars out, most likely a cloud cover but this light was very bright.  it came straight downwards, drifting in a steady controlled medium to slow apparent movement.   object was sphere shaped, and white.  when i first noticed it i thought it was a light that somehow came from one of the power lines, or a light on my garage.  it was neither and that was when i realized it was like nothing i had seen before.  i knew it was something to me unidentifiable.   i have never seen before anything like it in the sky and it was by itself, nothing else around it.  my feeling is/was that it is a ufo of what i do not know.  i lost sight of the object when it went past my field of vision, that is below my window view.  afterwards there was nothing to be seen outside. . i tried to estimate exactly how large it was or even where it was.  i can only say that it appeared softball size in relation to my window.  at first i thought it was near my garage by the road, but then i felt it could be very far away.  there are mountains in front of my house about a mile or so away, and it drifted below those so the object had to be in front of the mountains.  it has left me with a sense of needing to know what it was.
content.summary: Bright white orb light from sky straight descent downwards

content.detailedDescription: Took my dog out, looked up and saw very bright red/blue/golden flickering pulsing light. opened camera app, switched to video mode pressed record- activating my phones led flash to turn on. could not see object through my phones screen but the light may have increased/changed pattern of flickers. texted friend/almost neighbor with a nicer phone (better camera). took my dog inside, checked out window and it had not moved, it remained hovering, maybe slightly less active. received reply text from friend, disappeared in the time it took to glance at my phone for a second. i was very startled as i believe it may have rushed me. saw shadows out window and have not dared to approach window since (about 2 hours). a very unawesome noise creeped up, beeping humming that i could feel and hear.. if that makes sense. felt like it was right outside my window. i only now notice it's absence. wasnt going to include this as all of my senses are on high alert, but kept seeing static-like flashes in my apartment. the noise is back, truely terrified. dog has not acted strange; does not acknowledge noise.
content.summary: Star-like but much brighter. red and blueish flickering like candle or .. ufo. vanished. now i hear unsettling  perpetual beeping/humming

content.detailedDescription:
on 02/15/2015, at approximately 0105 hrs, my husband and i returned home in borden, indiana following an outing. first off, let me advise we did not see an object...But what happened, has not been explained satisfactory to any degree...And something big happened!!
     anyhow, as we stood in the kitchen of our home, the lights flickered throughout the entire house. they went completely out for about 3 seconds, back on again, completely out again for about 3 seconds, and then a very brief out again and back on. at the time, i thought nothing of it until i seen a post on facebook from our local news station wave 3 news. 
     at 0154, they posted "reports of power outages and lights flickering near lower hunters trace. what are you experiencing?"  first off, this area is located in kentucky. no where near where i am located. 
also, it is not on the same power plant, lines, or grid as my area.          
     louisville and the surrounding areas in kentucky are supplied by the massive lge and ku companies.  while i receive power from a rural co-op located in hamburg indiana. i opened to comment that we had experienced flashes in borden as well and was stunned at the comments that came prior to mine.
     there were reports not only of power outages and lights blinking, people reported that their cars stalled on the highway requiring them to restart the vehicle.  although there were over a thousand comments, i seen no less than a dozen reports of vehicles stalling, headlights dimming, and the radio inside of the car going to static.
     shortly after all of the reports started coming in, i began to notice the widespread area over which these reports were coming in. as far west (of those who reported issues) as corydon, indiana and brandenburg, kentucky.  as far north as columbus, indiana.  as far south as elizabethtown, kentucky. and as far east as madison, indiana and carrolton, kentucky.
     further, one person commented and posted photos of a field fire caused by a transformer blowing at a substation (in kentucky)managed by lge.  lge issued a statement that the problems and outages were caused by this blown transformer and subsequent fire.  quickly most everyone (including the media) dismissed all of the electrical issues on this blown transformer and went on.  the rest of us,...Not so much.
     although the transformer could have caused the problems with electricity in kentucky, it would have zero effect on the power of indiana residents and even less so, the electrical system in a vehicle, or a radio signal.
     those of us not so quick to dismiss, know something big happened. we know it affected houses, airports, cars, and we believe that whatever happened...Caused the transformer to blow.  however, we do not have answers even though we searched. solar activity was low, so the possibility of a flare was ruled out.  we were left with debating only 3 possiblities; computer hack, an emp; extra-terrestrial interference. 
     i don't know if anyone witnessed anything in the sky that night, but i do know a very widespread area experienced (a very scary) a massive electrical disturbance all at the very same time.  i have included a map that shows the locations where people experienced issues. the locations were pulled from the people who commented in response to wave 3 asking if anyone else was experiencing outages and flashing lights.  the reported locations are notated by the red stars. 
     now mind you, this wasn't just a few houses with a flicker in the light bulbs, people commented they seen all lights go out at standiford field airport in louisville, kentucky, all lights going out in a hospital (she didn't list which one), all lights going out in an entire amazon warehouse in jeffersonville, indiana, all lights on the kennedy bridge spanning the ohio river blinking out, peoples cars stalling (who were 50 miles apart) on the road.
     i am writing you because this was dismissed as a tranformer blowing "equipment malfunction." there is no way that this was the result of what everyone reported.
content.summary: An area approximately 100 miles in diameter involving 2 states reported mass electrical issues with radios, vehicles, lights blinking, transformers blowing.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving from portland to my sons house and saw several arching light in the shape of a disc. we stopped to take pictures of the unmoving craft it sat there as we watched it hovering. amazed at the size of the ship we had to stop and take a better look. it didn't move an inch even after we left back to on the road to lewiston 

location:
next to exit 25 eastbound
content.summary: Driving along the road saw a series of light above the mountains and hills

content.detailedDescription:
During my first visit to london in 2010 i arrived exhausted. woke up around 4am to start taking a set of flights that would eventually land me in london. it was a work trip but we had a little time to get acclimated. a day or so. a vendor was taking us out on the town on our first night there to an argetinian restaurant; goucho grille. after dinner we hit a few bars and i was taking as many pictures as i could. most of them without flash and trying to keep a steady hand of my camera. it was not until i was back in the u.S. about a month later that i realized that i had captured something rather interesting. and it wasn't until last week when i saw the episode of hangar:1 that i thought about sharing these pictures with you.

of course, by this point investigating them is out of the question, but what i realized while watching the show is that my pictures may very well corroborate someone else's account of the event.

the full album can be seen at the following link: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg], however, only the two pictures i am attaching are freely usable by you.

if you do use my pictures, all i ask is you let me know the episode.

thank you all for your research and the time you put into trying to find the truth!

-mauricio

p.S. i do apologize i can only send .Jpg format. i was using a work laptop while on my trip and picasa automatically reformatted them to .Jpg rather than the .Raw format i had them in which would have been much easier to enhance. the images have not been tampered with in any way, i downloaded them from the above album just minutes ago which had sat undisturbed since shortly after my trip. they do contain all proper xif data.
content.summary: Seen in pictures after the fact.

content.detailedDescription: After my wife took the pics, i her husband ,was looking at them later on wen i 'looked near the contrails i could see these round things in and out of con trails. the round things had spots in some them. some didn't there where five of them in one ? you would have to see pics! we were looking south in our driveway. so as i was looking at other pics of this it looked like they hanging around the contrails sucking up energy around them the contrails.The first round orbe that i saw had five spots in it,as it got closer to sun the five spots became there own orbe. my name is jim and my phone # 77251ninesix99one call any time!!!
content.summary: Taking photos of x chem trails when we captured lights / object (5) nearby no plane in view

content.detailedDescription: On friday 13, february 2015 i was sitting in my living room when i noticed that my son turned into our driveway and stopped his car up by the gate approx 300 ft east of the house. he sat there bout 10 minutes or so. i thought it was a bit unusual but i have seen him drive past the house down into the pasture checking out deer or coyotes etc. so i didn't think much of it. after a bit he came into the house and said, dad you  need to come take a look at this; so i got up and we went outside. he pointed to the south of the house and about 300 yards or so away were 2 objects, one a diamond shaped object about 300 or so feet above the ground and the other a thick donut shaped object about 150 feet up and maybe 100 feet west of the diamond shaped object. both were a dull orange color. the diamond shaped object seemed to "sparkle" while the donut remained a dull orange the entire time we observed it. i went back into the house and grabbed some binoculars hoping to see more detail but they just made the objects brighter. after approx 10 minutes or so we noticed the larger object, the diamond shaped one, started moving very slowly to the east. soon it was behind the trees. at that time we moved to the front or east side of the house. we couldn't see it at this point but could see the glow behind the trees so we moved out by the road in front of the house just as the object moved east out of the trees. as it moved across the road it started to rise. by the time it had crossed the road it was maybe 700-800 feet up. it sat there maybe 10 minutes or so. at this point we noticed a plane maybe 5 miles or so east of the house moving north to south and it was at this time that i noticed we could hear the plane but there was absolutely no noise coming from either object we were looking at. the donut shaped object had not moved at all. after about 10 minutes of hovering above the trees east of our county road the object started moving east again climbing to about 1000 ft then it started moving north, climbed to about 1500 feet, and started flashing lights and we watched it move north til it was out of sight. the donut shaped object never moved at all and eventually seemed to fade away. after a few more minutes we went back into the house. the diamond shaped object was maybe the size of a 727 and the donut shaped object was about one third that size.  i spent 27 years in the military and have lived all over the world  i was part of the 3rd marine air wing and so was around aircraft most of my life and i have never seen anything like what i saw that night.
content.summary: Saw 2 objects less than quarter mile south of my house approx 150 and 300 ft above trees

content.detailedDescription:
Ayer publiqué una foto que me envió un amigo en las que aparece una mancha que aparenta ser un ovni.
yo le pasé algunos filtros y parece que fuera un objeto sólido.
le pregunté si se las podía mandar y me dijo que si, pero manteniendo la reserva del caso sobre su nombre.
me mandó 2, una me parece q es un pájaro o algo así, la otra es la que publiqué.
si hacen click derecho en la foto les va a aparecer toda la info y verán q no está retocada.
si luego de estudiarla deciden publicarla, les ruego que antes de hacerlo me avisen para ver si mi amigo no tiene problema.
espero su dictamen luego del estudio.
saludos y quedo a las órdenes.
content.summary: Ayer publiqué una foto que me envió un amigo en las que aparece una mancha que aparenta ser un ovni. yo le pasé algunos filtros y parece que fuera un objeto sólido

content.detailedDescription:
370 w 800 n  apt 6

i was sun gazing and meditating on clearing the toxins from the atmosphere from the chem trails that were sprayed that day.  i was watching the chem trails break into the striated pattern you see in the photos.  thought it was interesting.  i did not see the orb with my naked eyes.  i took the photos based on the feeling that there was an et presence.
content.summary: Orb-like ufo?

content.detailedDescription: Siendo las 3:30 am del dia domingo 27/01/13 y encontrandome en la celebracion de un cumpleaños de una amiga en el parador figari de playa honda de malvin es que se sucedió este avistamiento osni perfectamente visible por todos quienes alli estabamos y que tambien pude corroborar minutos más tarde por personas ajenas al evento pero que se encontraban en las cercanias. era una espestacular noche de verano con un cielo totalmente claro y despejado y con una luna muy reluciente que a esa hora se ubicaba a nuestras espaldas cuando logro divisar sobre el horizonte en dirección sureste una especie de pequeña nebulosa blanca que me llamó la atención por estar el cielo totalmente claro y por la intensidad del blanco para ser una nube vista en horas de la noche. quienes conmigo estaban le restaron importancia al principio y desestimaron mi apreciación manifestando de que de una nube se trataba, pero la misma comenzó a crecer de tamaño y a ganar en altura y a medida que lo hacía comenzó a hacerse más luminosa en su núcleo y el alo circundante por momentos tomó forma de un espiral abierto para comenzar luego a decrecer paulatinamente pero nunca en su totalidad, por supuesto que de ahi en más comenzó a captar la atención del resto de las 5 personas que conmigo se hallaban y también de otro grupo de personas en el mismo lugar pero que no estaban en la arena con nosotros sino que estaban parados en la rambla misma según después me enteraría y desconozco si alguien más pues había gente desconocida para mi en los alrededores. cuando este fenómeno toma una altura en la que era necesario que elevaramos la vista es que se se pudo percibir una pequeña luz de color plateado verdoso no intermitente en su núcleo lo cual llevó a alguien a sugerir que se trataba de un simple avion y que el mismo venía en nuestra dirección por lo cual ya podríamos en breves despejar nuestras dudas. estoy acostumbrado a ver todo tipo de aeronaves y sabía que esto no era nada visto por mi anteriormente y que no estabamos viendo una luz roja intermitente sino que de a ratos lo que apreciabamos era el brillo de algún material metálico o simil debido a que la intensidad del mismo no era muy alta. conforme pasaban los segundos me dí cuenta de que el objeto no venía en nuestra dirección como aparentaba sino que estaba en ascenso pero la perspectiva del lugar en que nos encontrabamos había llevado a mi amigo a hacer una conjetura errada. durante esos escasos dos minutos (a lo sumo tres) que habrá durado su ascenso se logró ver apenas tres o cuatro veces ese pequeño reflejo que se asemejaba más bien a la luz de una estrella de baja intensidad, por supuesto que siempre recubierto de esa especie de nebulosa que fué disminuyendo en intensidad conforme ganaba en altura hasta esfumarse por completo y de manera abrupta al acanzar la atmósfera. debido a que en la orientación en la que el fenómeno comenzó a manifestarse emergiendo en el horizonte no existe posibilidad alguna de existencia de tierra y se trata de mar abierto es que hablo de avistaniento osni, este es un hecho donde el objeto en cuestion salió del mar para ascender hasta desaparecer por completo al abandonar la atmósfera terrestre, algo que nisiquiera podría igualar un misil disparado por un submarino o buque en altamar. minutos despues de lo acontecido me encontré con una pareja desconocida y ajena al evento en el que me encontraba que también observó lo ocurrido mientras caminaba por la rambla de malvin, y por la muy clara visibilidad de lo ocurrido en una noche como esa en el paseo preferido por la mayoría de los montevideanos es dable de esperar que aparezcan más testimonios e incluso algún documento de lo ocurrido, pero hasta el momento no he podido encontrar nada en la web por lo que gradecería ser notificado de cualquier novedad que puedan tener al respecto, desde ya muchas gracias.
content.summary: Avistaniento osni, este es un hecho donde el objeto en cuestion salió del mar para ascender hasta desaparecer por completo al abandonar la atmósfera terrestre

content.detailedDescription: Tengo dos fotos consecutivas que tienen luces en el cielo y la verdad me intriga saber si se trata de un efecto de la luz o de un ovni. admito que en ese momento no vi nada en el cielo, no me doy cuenta de haber mirado. las luces las vi en las fotos la noche siguiente al ser tomadas, es decir el 10/02/2013
content.summary: Tengo dos fotos consecutivas que tienen luces en el cielo y la verdad me intriga saber si se trata de un efecto de la luz o de un ovni.

content.detailedDescription:
Hola, reporto esto porque creo que puede ser util, ante que nada yo no
soy de hacer estas cosas y no creo mucho en esto mas bien siempre
pienso en que son aviones o helicopteros no tengo evidencia pero me
sorprenio

    fecha y hora: 4/4/2014, aprox 20:14, clima: despejado. que se
encontraba haciendo en ese momento: estaba en un omnibus
    ¿cuánto tiempo duró el avistamiento?  aproximadamente 8 minutos
desde que me percate del mismo
    forma de objeto(s). un punto de luz, como una estrella de magnitud 0 o 1
    color del objeto(s). rojo, como las luces de las antenas o torres
  direeccion: las piedras, visto desde la ventana del bus
    dirección del objeto. por el noroeste, aprox. a una altura de 30°
parecia medio lejano

    movimientos.  fijo cuando creia que era una nueva torre, pero
luego un movimiento casi lineal por unos segundos a una velocidad no
muy rapida pero anormal para un avion o helicoptero, el movimiento fue
de derecha a izquierda, pero luego se fijo la intencidad de la luz
cambio un poco, pero luego se me dificulto la vision por los arboles,
reitero no soy de andar con esto pero espero no ser el unico que vio
eso, esa anormal aceleracion me dejo helado, escribi apurado por eso
las faltas, espero haber contribuido en algo
content.summary: Un punto de luz, como una estrella pero luego un movimiento casi lineal por unos segundos

content.detailedDescription:
Buenas tardes alexander. 

ante la duda que me ha surgido tras observar la fotografía adjunta, se la envío para que mufon la estudie y por favor me confirme si los elementos que se ven en los círculos rojos podrían ser  o.V.N.I.S

la fotografía fue tomada el día 16/07/13 a las 14:46 hs. en el departamento de rivera, el equipo utilizado fue un celular samsung c-3300 k. 

al momento de tomarla, cuando se estaba recorriendo la zona de cuchilla de venta quemada (rivera), el vidrio del vehículo en que iba estaba bajo, por lo que se descarta la posibilidad de que sea una mancha de barro, un insecto, etc. asimismo, el día estaba completamente soleado, sin nubes y claro, no observándose nada particular que se destacara en el cielo (avión, grupos de aves, etc.). 

estos "objetos" no se divisaron en ningún momento, sólo después de revisar la foto en mi computadora los noté, pero en persona nunca se los vio.

también le envío la foto original ya que la otra con círculos sirve para ubicar los "objetos".

espero que le sea útil este aporte y les agradezco si me puede confirmar la correcta recepción de este correo.

cordialmente,
content.summary: Ante la duda que me ha surgido tras observar la fotografía adjunta, se la envío para que mufon la estudie

content.detailedDescription: On 2/13/15 i was on my way to taking my daughter to school.It was around 7;20 am. my daughter saw the light first and pointed out to me.We was going south on st rt 68 and the light was in the sky on passenger side of my van. it was moving east then it stopped for about a minute then it took off again in a nw direction.There was traffic behind me so i didn't slow down much. it didn't take long for it to disappear.It was very bright with no flashing lights on it. it is the biggest brightest light i have ever seen in the sky or moving in the sky.My daughter and i was both kinda shocked. it did not look like a plane or helicopter.Could not really make out any type of shape or markings cause it was way to bright.I would say it was kinda like a triangle but more longated.
content.summary: Bright light in sky. it was to the west of us,while taking daughter to school in morning

content.detailedDescription: Feb. 26 2013 7pm left my house to go to my girlfriends. almost a mile onto midlothian rd. i noticed a bright light to my right. as it came into view above the subdivision, i asked my girlfriend to stop. she stopped momentarily and i put the window down and stuck my head out to get a look and listen. it was completely silent and motionless hovering above the houses and trees at the top of the next hill (maybe 500-600ft) it looked like the top of a sky scraper with all the metal boxes etc turned upside down wrapped in  a protective railing or fence with antennas and rods sticking out. it was surrounded by a ring of lights all facing the ground. the object above it was dark, the underside lights made it look more dark i'm sure, but i could not see the edges although the darkness above it kept the bright lights from going any higher than where they shone from. also the clouds were not lit from the bright array so the object blocked the light. (the city of mundelein directly to the north showwed the light reflection from its own lights above it very clearly, this was black above it. the superstructure with its boxes,antennas,lights,etc was at the center bottom of a huge black mass that sloped up on all sides. my girlfriend was fighting with me so she did not want to stop and look at anything, she yelled at me "its a billboard!" and pulled onto midlothian road. i watched the object as long as i could untill the road turned and it went behind the trees and other obstructions. we returned to my house about an hour later because i had to sell a piece of equipment. the object was nowhere to be seen at that time, but the image has been stuck in my head ever since. i painted a picture right away although it doesn't have all the detail in the superstructure, it captured the basic image so i could show people what i saw. in the map photo i attatched it was above the circle drive to the right of the oval park in the center of the photo. i will try when sam calls back to get gps info, not sure how to get this off of google earth.
content.summary: On the night of feb. 26 2013 7pm, saw large superstructure underneath a obviously huge ship hovering above a subdivision off of midlothian rd.

content.detailedDescription:
1. sitting on the porch relaxing

2. i started looking at what i thought was a very bright star and continued to observe it.

3. i remembered some talk about venus being visible around that time and was thinking it must be venus.  

4. as i continued to watch the object across the small valley across the road from my house (the road follows the valley). i noticed that the gap between the "star" and the hill top was getting smaller and i was beginning to think that it was moving so i continued watching. it came closer and closer to the point i was sure it was moving and i noticed that the light had a mass behind it which it was affixed to. it seemed to get lower as it came closer, it was heading perfectly in my direction. it appeared to move very slowly and seemed fairly close to the ground. once i was able to make out the shape, like a policeman's shield style badge except slightly broader it was seeming to go such a slow rate of speed that it would not be able to stay in the air. as i watched and once i seen the shape i felt the oddest feeling that "it" was aware that "it" was being watched and i started to feel a rising fear and as soon as i started to feel uneasy it banked slowly tipping the left side towards the ground (assuming the pointed end was the front) which positioned the bottom of the craft where i could clearly see the shape from the bottom. having made a slow left (my right hand side) turn it headed west seeming to more or less following the road. 

6.It had been behind some trees in my viewpoint so it was becoming harder to see and i went out in the yard but the trees were still in my view which leads me to believe it was even lower than i thought to begin with because the trees at the time were just average trees pretty tall though i would imagine no more than 30ft tall but where i was standing was on the hillside so the road was lower than the bottom of the trees. i never heard any sound except for a very slight jet drone after i could not see it but i looked around and there was some aircraft lighting in the sky only a few and i attributed that sound to those planes. this was not a plane by no stretch and the "appendages" where only like those on a badge shape... like this image, http://etc.Usf.Edu/clipart/63500/63547/63547_tilt_shield_lg.Gif   that would be the bottom outline shape of what i saw.  if you can figure out what this thing is i would love to know. my dad seemed to think it may have been some type of stealth blimp? there is a very small airport southwestish from my location. but only small personal type aircraft have i ever seen around it.
content.summary: Policeman's badge shaped ufo in surry co. north carolina

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching a rocket launch from my front porch on 2/11/15. the rocket launched from cape canaveral, fl. i took several photos of the rocket as it gained altitude. i saw nothing unusual while taking photos.
it wasn't until i loaded the photos on my computer and looked at them that i noticed an object on one photo only in the same shot as the rocket.
it wasn't there on the photo before and it wasn't there on the photo after. there were only a few seconds between photos. 
i send the three photos to gary mobley, the florida mufon state section director to view. he stated that if you blow the object up, it appears to be a cylinder.
he told me to report it.
content.summary: Object appeared on photo of rocket launch

content.detailedDescription: I was in iowa, visiting family. i was driving home and stopped to take pictures becuase the cloud formations were strange. i got out of the truck. walked in front of the truck and noticed a fast moving light that changed directions rapidly. at that time i took a panama mic view picture of my surroundings. i felt a chill, and dazed a bit like i had been drinking or moved at a fast rate of speed then suddenly stopping. i got in the truck to look at the pictures and noticed i had captured a low flying object that was on the road in front of me. i zoomed in to see what it was.... there is a cylinder shaped object with a hatch door open and something with 2 eyes peering at me. it freaked me out. i know we are not the only living thing in the universe but when you are less than 29 feet from et it gets real. i never shared this with anyone until now. i have a couple photos from that day. they are in my facebook account so i screen shot them to post them here.
content.summary: Weird weather, cloud formations, bout 45 degrees out, noone around but me, took pictures, caught

content.detailedDescription: I had just stepped out my patio door and looked up in the sky. i saw a ufo saucer shaped, flying in a straight line path to the north. i had my camera close by and took a couple of pictures quickly. i have seen many ufo's in my area and have reported them in the past. i quickly called the mufon investigator jean walker who has worked my case in the past and was told to report this sighting.
content.summary: Saw a ufo saucer shape as i stepped out my patio door and took photo

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 0510 in december 1998 /99 i was letting my dog out in to the back yard before i went to work.

as i went outside the entire area gradually went from full dark to full day light (it was a bright white light), i looked up in to the sky and saw an inverted y shaped smoke column and the light then faded, there was no sound of an explosion, i waited for several minutes listening,i could not see the smoke trail in the dark.

the light was like a dimmer switch being turned up full and then down again.

the arms of the inverted y (this is just guessing)could have been several hundred to several thousand feet long and several hundred feet in diameter and the single pillar of the inverted y was the same length as the arms of the y. there was no way of guessing the altitude as there was nothing else in he sky.

i have looked for reports of this in the national and local press but have found nothing and i am not aware of anybody else seeing this. 

i can provide a sketch if required
content.summary: Not applicable but see below

content.detailedDescription: Ask me i got pics and then some!
content.summary: Smart entity with direction and attentivniss/

content.detailedDescription:
1.At home on our outside front faced patio/deck.
2.The sharp movement and flew opposite direction too quick.
3. ufo!
4.Zig zag real quick and sharp.
5.I've seen some questionable things here before by myself, usually during twilight early a.M. 
i loaded it to my page , [ page title moved to fi section/cms/tg] on facebook and added a comment, asking" am i trippin or is this a ufo", ?
a follower named [name removed/cms/tg] was only one who was able to spot the indifference of the object/s and the flying birds.
6.Curious but i really felt like i may have a sighting.
7.Pressed stop on my phones video player because the birds flew out of frame.
content.summary: Dusk and decided to make a  video for my group on facebook
